contents.name: Data Scientist
contents.description: A data scientist analyzes and interprets extremely complex and large data sets, typically in order to assist an organization in its decision making.

contents.name: Algorithms
contents.description: Simply put, an algorithm is a self-contained step-by-step set of operations to be performed.

contents.name: Data Science
contents.description: Data science is an interdisciplinary field about processes and systems to extract knowledge or insights from data in various forms, either structured or unstructured.

contents.name: CS Disciplines
contents.description: Computer science and engineering areas of interest, not including languages, tools, technologies.
